SharedSavingPaymentAgreement.name: SharedSavingPaymentAgreement
SharedSavingPaymentAgreement.description: Specifies the payment terms for contracts of Shared Saving Payment Agreement type.

BenchmarkEndDateTime.description: The end date of the benchmark period based on which the profit or loss is determined for the Shared Saving payment type.

BenchmarkStartDateTime.description: The start date of the benchmark period based on which the profit or loss is determined for the Shared Saving payment type.

BenchmarkedExpenditureAmount.description: This is the expenditure amount for the selected benchmark period.

ContractPaymentAgreementId.description: The contract payment agreement record to which this shared savings payment agreement is associated.

ForecastedExpenditureAmount.description: This is the expenditure amount that's forecasted for the contract payment agreement duration.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced the record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed the record.

LossPlanDescription.description: The description of the shared savings payment agreement in case of a loss.

Name.description: The name of the shared savings payment agreement.

ProfitPlanDescription.description: The description of the shared savings payment agreement when a profit is attained.

QualifyingProfitPercentage.description: The minimum profit percentage to be reached to share the profit.
